title: HeartSeeker Varus Voice
body:
Hi 
I mainly play adc champs ,
I purchased the new heartseeker Varus skin and I wonder why the Skins in the 1350 Rp section dont have Voiceovers like PrimeTime Draven for example.
Dont know how you guys feel about it abut when I pay a Skin 1350 RP and one time there is a nice Voiceover and at the other you " only " get the new skin I feel kinda exploited. If there was a biger price difference I would understand it but at this point either 975 RP or a additional Voiceover!

what do you think?

replies.body:
i've bought this skin too... Well its a bummer that there is no voiceover... But sometimes its funny to hear his taunts with his actual cute style xD 

Would be awesome if they rework it but i don't think they will..
